events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorised under our Engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter experienced in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, highlighting your relevant software development experience.
You responded promptly with detailed answers to our initial screening questions, reflecting strong communication skills.
Your technical interview with our senior engineers has been scheduled for 2024-05-15 at 10:00 AM UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
